Type.Name: NotebookPage
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The Notebook page is a widget used to store and represent a single page of a Usually it will contain a but it can contain other widgets giving the developer the possibility to use custom widgets.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int Num (Gtk.Notebook notebook, Gtk.Widget child);

Docs.summary: Returns the number of the NotebookPage containing the widget 'child' in the Notebook.
Docs.param: The Notebook that contains the widget 'child'.
The widget we are looking for.
Docs.returns: The number of the NotebookPage containing the given widget. -1 if the widget is not found in the Notebook.

remarks.para: Returns the number of the NotebookPage containing a given widget in a given Notebook or -1 if the widget is not found.

Docs.returns: An instance of NotebookPage, wrapping the C object.

remarks.para: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.
This is a constructor used by derivative types of . This is not typically used by C# code.
